languages.text: "Я встретил{mf||а} капитана Кляйна на грузовой магистрали. Он проявил смекалку и доблесть".
"I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."
languages.original_text: "Я встретил{mf||а} капитана Кляйна на грузовой магистрали. Он проявил смекалку и доблесть".

traits.locale_text: "I met Lieutenant Klein on the freight line. He showed ingenuity and valour."
"I met Lieutenant Klein on the freight line. He showed ingenuity and valour."
"I met Lieutenant Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."
"I met Lieutenant Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."
"I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."
"I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."

languages.text: «Me encontré al capitán Klein en la línea de carga. Demostró gran ingenio y valor».
languages.original_text: "I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."

traits.locale_text: «Me encontré al capitán Klein en la línea de carga. Demostró gran ingenio y valor».

languages.text: 「貨物線でクライン中隊長に会った。素晴らしい独創性と勇気を見せてくれたよ」
languages.original_text: "I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."

traits.locale_text: 「貨物線でクライン中隊長に会った。素晴らしい独創性と勇気を見せてくれたよ」

languages.text: “我在货运区域遇到了克莱因上尉，他展现出了过人的才智与勇气。”
languages.original_text: "I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."

traits.locale_text: “我在货运区域遇到了克莱因上尉，他展现出了过人的才智与勇气。”

languages.text: "Ich bin Captain Klein auf der Güterstrecke begegnet. Er hat großen Einfallsreichtum und Mut bewiesen."
languages.original_text: "I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Captain Klein auf der Güterstrecke begegnet. Er hat großen Einfallsreichtum und Mut bewiesen."

languages.text: « J'ai rencontré le capitaine Klein sur la ligne de fret. Il a fait preuve d'ingéniosité et d'une grande bravoure. »
languages.original_text: "I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai rencontré le capitaine Klein sur la ligne de fret. Il a fait preuve d'ingéniosité et d'une grande bravoure. »

languages.text: "Yük hattında Komutan Klein'la karşılaştım. Büyük bir marifet ve yiğitlik sergiledi."
languages.original_text: "I met Captain Klein on the freight line. He showed great ingenuity and valour."
